name: Sweet Whispers and Love Letters
description:
Sweet Whispers and Love Letters - 

Made for the Academy of Interactive Entertainment (AIE) Adelaide for Major Production in the second year of the Advance Diploma of Professional Game Development.

Sweet Whispers and Love Letters is a visual novel game in which you play the main character, who has been instructed by their therapist, Dr Moss, to go to a new town, doing this will help you get more interactions with other people, something you need.

By interacting with other people you will find out their stories, what they like and don't like and how specific things can effect them specifically.

This game was made with the intention to destigmatize mental illness and the sexualization of the visual novel genre, combining these two aspects made Sweet Whispers and Love letters, a game that those who have already played the game found fascinating for its premise and what it presents in the game.

To find everyone that has worked on this game, please go to this website here. https://showcase.aie.edu.au/project/sweet-whispers-and-love-letters/

Only one chapter is playable, but hopefully you all have fun with the one chapter!
